name: reconspect
description: Laboratory for exploring visualization component architecture and specification within Resonant

scripts.uglify: cat src/js/reconspect/preamble.js src/js/reconspect/dummy.js src/js/reconspect/vcharts.js | tee site/reconspect.js | uglifyjs -m >site/reconspect.min.js
scripts.copy: mkdir -p site/js && cp node_modules/d3/d3.* node_modules/vcharts/vcharts.* node_modules/vega/vega.* site/js/
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run jade && npm run index && npm run uglify && npm run stylesheets && npm run copy

author: Roni Choudhury
